data.feedback: Plan is comprehensive and accurately maps to existing codebase. All 7 user-requested epics are covered. File references verified - filesToModify and filesToRead all exist. Backend API mapping is correct and verified against actual route files. Pattern compliance is excellent - follows existing abstract final class patterns, uses established DI and error handling approaches.
